Document both declare_cache_behavior parameters and options list

Source: R/pkg_ref_cache_behaviors.R
roxygen_cache_behaviors.Rd

Document both declare_cache_behavior parameters and options list

Usage

roxygen_cache_behaviors(
  fmt = "%s: %s",
  name_fmt = "%s",
  annotation_fmt = "%s",
  wrap_fmt = "%s",
  collapse = "\n"
)

Arguments

fmt

format of cache behavior entries

name_fmt

special formating for name (first) component

annotation_fmt

special formating for annotation (second) component

wrap_fmt

a wrapper for the entirety of the roxygen entries

collapse

passed to paste

Value

a string

On this page

Developed by R Validation Hub, Doug Kelkhoff, Marly Gotti, Eli Miller, Kevin K, Yilong Zhang, Eric Milliman, Juliane Manitz.
